source.name: The Metaverse Interop Show, the Podcast
source.description: Welcome to Metaverse Interop, a podcast that helps metaverse founders and investors make informed product decisions by promoting open standards.

episodes.title: Lighthouse: Explore the Metaverse with your friends
episodes.description: An interview with Jonathan Brun of Lighthouse.

episodes.title: A chat with Tom Ffiske (Accenture, Immersive Wire)
episodes.description: We discuss the Metaverse, Interop, and our ideal virtual Worlds.

episodes.title: Metaverse AMA, Steamy Tub Edition (AUDIO)
episodes.description: Caroline and I take a break from vacation to chat about the Metaverse.
